00025 // main system configuration
00026 require '../../../sysconfig.inc.php';
00027 // start the session
00028 require SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'admin/default/session.inc.php';
00029 require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_GUI/table/simbio_table.inc.php';
00030 require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_GUI/form_maker/simbio_form_table_AJAX.inc.php';
00031 require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_GUI/paging/simbio_paging_ajax.inc.php';
00032 require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_DB/simbio_dbop.inc.php';
00033 
00034 // privileges checking
00035 $can_read = utility::havePrivilege('bibliography', 'r');
00036 $can_write = utility::havePrivilege('bibliography', 'w');
00037 
00038 if (!$can_read) {
00039     die('<div class="errorBox">'.__('You are not authorized to view this section').'</div>');
00040 }
00041 
00042 if (isset($_POST['doExport'])) {
00043     // check for form validity
00044     if (empty($_POST['fieldSep']) OR empty($_POST['fieldEnc'])) {
00045         utility::jsAlert(__('Required fields (*)  must be filled correctly!'));
00046         exit();
00047     } else {
00048         // set PHP time limit
00049         set_time_limit(0);
00050 
00051         // create local function to fetch values
00052         function getValues($obj_db, $str_query)
00053         {
00054             // make query from database
00055             $_value_q = $obj_db->query($str_query);
00056             if ($_value_q->num_rows > 0) {
00057                 $_value_buffer = '';
00058                 while ($_value_d = $_value_q->fetch_row()) {
00059                     if ($_value_d[0]) {
00060                         $_value_buffer .= '<'.$_value_d[0].'>';
00061                     }
00062                 }
00063                 return $_value_buffer;
00064             }
00065             return null;
00066         }
00067 
00068         // limit
00069         $sep = trim($_POST['fieldSep']);
00070         $encloser = trim($_POST['fieldEnc']);
00071         $limit = intval($_POST['recordNum']);
00072         $offset = intval($_POST['recordOffset']);
00073         if ($_POST['recordSep'] === 'NEWLINE') {
00074             $rec_sep = "\n";
00075         } else if ($_POST['recordSep'] === 'RETURN') {
00076             $rec_sep = "\r";
00077         } else {
00078             $rec_sep = trim($_POST['recordSep']);
00079         }
00080         // fetch all data from biblio table
00081         $sql = "SELECT
00082             b.biblio_id, b.title, gmd.gmd_name, b.edition,
00083             b.isbn_issn, publ.publisher_name, b.publish_year,
00084             b.collation, b.series_title, b.call_number,
00085             lang.language_name, pl.place_name, b.classification,
00086             b.notes, b.image, b.file_att
00087             FROM biblio AS b
00088             LEFT JOIN mst_gmd AS gmd ON b.gmd_id=gmd.gmd_id
00089             LEFT JOIN mst_publisher AS publ ON b.publisher_id=publ.publisher_id
00090             LEFT JOIN mst_language AS lang ON b.language_id=lang.language_id
00091             LEFT JOIN mst_place AS pl ON b.publish_place_id=pl.place_id ";
00092         if ($limit > 0) { $sql .= ' LIMIT '.$limit; }
00093         if ($offset > 1) {
00094             if ($limit > 0) {
00095                 $sql .= ' OFFSET '.($offset-1);
00096             } else {
00097                 $sql .= ' LIMIT '.($offset-1).',99999999999';
00098             }
00099         }
00100         // for debugging purpose only
00101         // die($sql);
00102         $all_data_q = $dbs->query($sql);
00103         if ($dbs->error) {
00104             utility::jsAlert(__('Error on query to database, Export FAILED!'));
00105         } else {
00106             if ($all_data_q->num_rows > 0) {
00107                 header('Content-type: text/plain');
00108                 header('Content-Disposition: attachment; filename="senayan_biblio_export.csv"');
00109                 while ($biblio_d = $all_data_q->fetch_row()) {
00110                     $buffer = null;
00111                     foreach ($biblio_d as $idx => $fld_d) {
00112                         // skip biblio_id field
00113                         if ($idx > 0) {
00114                             $fld_d = $dbs->escape_string($fld_d);
00115                             // data
00116                             $buffer .=  stripslashes($encloser.$fld_d.$encloser);
00117                             // field separator
00118                             $buffer .= $sep;
00119                         }
00120                     }
00121                     // authors
00122                     $authors = getValues($dbs, 'SELECT a.author_name FROM biblio_author AS ba
00123                         LEFT JOIN mst_author AS a ON ba.author_id=a.author_id
00124                         WHERE ba.biblio_id='.$biblio_d[0]);
00125                     $buffer .= $encloser.$authors.$encloser;
00126                     $buffer .= $sep;
00127                     // topics
00128                     $topics = getValues($dbs, 'SELECT t.topic FROM biblio_topic AS bt
00129                         LEFT JOIN mst_topic AS t ON bt.topic_id=t.topic_id
00130                         WHERE bt.biblio_id='.$biblio_d[0]);
00131                     $buffer .= $encloser.$topics.$encloser;
00132                     $buffer .= $sep;
00133                     // item code
00134                     $items = getValues($dbs, 'SELECT item_code FROM item AS i
00135                         WHERE i.biblio_id='.$biblio_d[0]);
00136                     $buffer .= $encloser.$items.$encloser;
00137                     echo $buffer;
00138                     echo $rec_sep;
00139                 }
00140                 exit();
00141             } else {
00142                 utility::jsAlert(__('There is no record in bibliographic database yet, Export FAILED!'));
00143             }
00144         }
00145     }
00146     exit();
00147 }

00158 // create new instance
00159 $form = new simbio_form_table_AJAX('mainForm', $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'], 'post');
00160 $form->submit_button_attr = 'name="doExport" value="'.__('Export Now').'" class="button"';
00161 
00162 // form table attributes
00163 $form->table_attr = 'align="center" id="dataList" cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0"';
00164 $form->table_header_attr = 'class="alterCell" style="font-weight: bold;"';
00165 $form->table_content_attr = 'class="alterCell2"';
00166 
00167 /* Form Element(s) */
00168 // field separator
00169 $form->addTextField('text', 'fieldSep', __('Field Separator').'*', ''.htmlentities(',').'', 'style="width: 10%;" maxlength="3"');
00170 //  field enclosed
00171 $form->addTextField('text', 'fieldEnc', __('Field Enclosed With').'*', ''.htmlentities('"').'', 'style="width: 10%;"');
00172 // record separator
00173 $rec_sep_options[] = array('NEWLINE', 'NEWLINE');
00174 $rec_sep_options[] = array('RETURN', 'CARRIAGE RETURN');
00175 $form->addSelectList('recordSep', __('Record Separator'), $rec_sep_options);
00176 // number of records to export
00177 $form->addTextField('text', 'recordNum', __('Number of Records To Export (0 for all records)'), '0', 'style="width: 10%;"');
00178 // records offset
00179 $form->addTextField('text', 'recordOffset', __('Start From Record'), '1', 'style="width: 10%;"');
00180 // output the form
00181 echo $form->printOut();
